EmailTemplate.name: Decoding CFR.Send Email 4b - Sorry we missed you.Subject Line Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry We Missed You. Here’s Your Webinar Replay Link
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re sorry we missed you at the IHL/NCR webinar.
But we recorded the whole event so you can get the insights you need to reimagine your future with self-checkouts.
Listen to the webinar replay and hear how self-checkouts are transforming the customer and operational experience for c-stores. ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> Have questions or want additional information on NCR’s Self-Checkout innovations for convenience retailers? Just contact us <[[https://www.ncr.com/contact-us]]> and we’ll give you a call back.
No risk, no hard sell—just information.
In the meantime, join us <[[https://ncr.webex.com/ncr/onstage/g.php?MTID=e5adc1243e9a5422c3781567f281a312b]]> for an upcoming webinar about the factors you need to consider when you're evaluating the right fit for self-service in your store—from the essentials of a successful pilot project to staff training and change management.Webinar: Self-Checkout: Key Best Practices for SuccessDate: Thursday, November 12, 2020 Time: 2p.m. Eastern Standard Time ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]>
